--- On Fri, 8/20/10,=
 Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <=
purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Run for lives!--or not.
T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, August 20, 2010, 10:27 AM


=C2=A0=
 




=C2=A0Sooooo, I must be paranormal! That definition is useless. That =
just means anything that is not understood is paranormal, anything that doe=
sn't happen everyday is paranormal. Thinking the boxes or ghost fit this ex=
tremely wide paranormal definition is is useless. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0The main pr=
oblem here=C2=A0are those few that think somehow they are so much=C2=A0more=
 qualified and superior that they can dictate how and what everyone else th=
inks and does. There are sick individuals on both sides, believers and skep=
tics=C2=A0that fall into this. I know one guy that has to believe the boxes=
 and seemingly=C2=A0all things paranormal started with him and he'll threat=
en violence on anyone that disagrees. Another thinks he is the only one tha=
t properly use the boxes and can determine who uses them. How many sites ar=
e on the web claiming to be the world's experts on the box, or the paranorm=
al?
=C2=A0
=C2=A0What about the skeptics that can accept no evidence--they =
too claim there is nothing paranormal, but they can't test any boxes themse=
lves, can not accept any evidence, and thus having nothing to stand on reso=
rt to name calling to try to get the paranormal to go away. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0A=
s far as threatening goes, does anyone realize threatening via e-mail is a =
federal crime? The FBI does in fact have a site set up for reporting these =
crimes. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I remember reading in some books when I was younger h=
ow the paranormal and psychic endeavours are not for everyone, some get int=
o this field and go insane, and there is evidencee for that. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0=
F-S

=C2=A0 



Paranormal is anything that can't be=
 explained as normal.

n <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

=C2=A0Ok, my apologies. =
I can be harsh. I would still like to know just what you think "paranormal"=
 is. Does something have to be presented on TAPS, or maybe Discovery Channe=
l to qualitfy? 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S





On Thu, Aug 19, 2010 at 11:26 AM, Rj =
<rasterer@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 







Since my personal results do n=
ot show anything paranormal,=C2=A0 I ask experts to help with the tests: th=
e experts being the people here. That I way I can learn.=C2=A0 I have contr=
ibuted a testing process so far, run several public tests, and even though =
they were not positive results, I did not "tout it all over the web".=C2=A0=
 I have not criticized.=C2=A0 I just don't automatically believe everything=
 people tell me.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
I don't understand why you would think that =
should be reason to be kicked out of the group.
